title: Choosing type to match illustrations
content:
What strategies do you use to choose a typeface that complements and stylistically matches an illustration?

There are times when an illustration is making an obvious historical reference and it is easier to choose a font from the same time period or movement. Contemporary illustration is harder for me. What do you look for?
author: cumaso

comments.content:
- Weight
- Contrast
- Complexity (presence/absence of fussy details)
